page.title: 10SW BASINGSTOKE: CLUBS
page.content: Regular{discos}are held at Kempshott Club, Christ the King hall on Brighton Hill , and at The Estate Club in Farleigh Wallop (which many years ago used to be the local Blacksmiths). There is a{ boy's club}at Hill Rise Hall every Thursday, 6.30-8 pm, where they can play rounders, table-tennis, snooker, pool or football. The following{scouting groups} meet every week in the Basingstoke area: Guides:Hill Rise Hall,Wednesday.7-9 pm Brownies:Hill Rise Hall,Tuesday.6-7 pm Brownies:Christ the King,Wed.6-7.30 pm Scouts:The Scout Hut,Wed/Friday.7-9 pm Cubs: The Scout Hut,Schubert Road, Mon/Tues/Thurs.6.30-8.00 pm On Bank Holidays{ craft-fayres} are held at Viables Craft Centre. Dancers, actors , bands , and model - railway enthusiasts take part together with resident craftsmen.
